name: Kweeuu
description:
This is my first game. I made it in two years, alone, as an autodidact. When I started, I knew absolutely nothing about coding, modeling, animation ... in fact nothing, I was just a player (not even a modder). This partly explains that some aspects are poorly mastered. 

Today, the development of the game is suspended (except some adjustments depending on your feedbacks) for two reasons. Firstly because to reach a really satisfying result, there is still a lot of work that I do not feel the courage to accomplish (In short, the "first game syndrome") and secondly becouse I have some other projects (like this one for exemple) that I would like to work on.

Now what I'm looking for is having enough feedback to engage a dialogue (either in substance or form) and to learn from you things that could help me in my future projects. Or, who knows, regain the taste and energy to put in place the thousand ideas I have in mind to diversify the game situations on this one.
